quoteText:
Data Retention

In order to provide our services to you, we will retain your information for the duration of your membership in the Roll20 service, and unless you request that we delete your information sooner, for one (1) year thereafter.
title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
